verses.verse: A Psalm by David. The Lord is my shepherd, I shall want nothing.
In a verdant pasture he hath fixed my abode. He hath fed me by gently flowing water
and restored my soul. He hath led me in paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
For though I walk amidst the shades of death: I will fear no ills, because thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff have been my comfort.
Thou hast spread a table before me; in the presence of them who afflict me. With oil thou hast anointed my head; and thine exhilarating cup is the very best.
Thy mercy will surely follow me all the days of my life; and my dwelling shall be in the house of the Lord to length of days.
